actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1571.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #858 (328-0).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 10909) to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and strengthen the program under that Act for national standards for and licensing of clinical laboratories, to amend the Social Security Act to require laboratories providing services financed under titles XVIII and XIX of such Act to meet the requirements of such program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 10909 (Public Health Service Act).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 10909) to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and strengthen the program under that Act for national standards for and licensing of clinical laboratories, to amend the Social Security Act to require laboratories providing services financed under titles XVIII and XIX of such Act to meet the requirements of such program, and for other purposes.
